publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-946# Alex Neil: STG Pension Fund-That the Parliament calls upon the trustees of the Scottish Transport Group (STG) Pension Fund to use the surpluses in the fund to provide higher pensions for the former STG employees.

S1M-946# STG Pension Fund (lodged on 2 June 2000) Christine Grahame*, Cathie Craigie*

S1M-946# Alex Neil: STG Pension Fund-That the Parliament calls upon the trustees of the Scottish Transport Group (STG) Pension Fund to use the surpluses in the fund to provide higher pensions for the former STG employees.
